00032 struct Gaussian2D : public std::binary_function<int, int, double>
00033 {
00034     Gaussian2D(int centerx, int centery, 
00035                double sd = 1.0, double scale = 1.0):
00036         cx(centerx), cy(centery), sdsq(sd * sd), s(scale){}
00037 
00038     double operator()(int x, int y) {
00039         return (s / (2 * PI * sdsq)) 
00040                * exp(-((x - cx) * (x - cx) + (y - cy) * (y - cy)) / (2 * sdsq));
00041     }
00042 
00043     int cx, cy;
00044     double sdsq, s;
00045 };
00046 
00050 struct Ring2D : public std::binary_function<int, int, double>
00051 {
00060     Ring2D(int centerx, int centery, double OuterRadius = 2.0,
00061             double InnerRadius = 1.0, double scale = 1.0):
00062     cx(centerx), cy(centery), rin2(InnerRadius*InnerRadius),
00063     rout2(OuterRadius*OuterRadius), s(scale)
00064     {
00065         area = PI * (rout2-rin2);
00066     }
00067 
00068     double operator()(int X, int Y)
00069     {
00070         double x = static_cast<double>(X);
00071         double y = static_cast<double>(Y);
00072 
00073         double n = (x-cx)*(x-cx)+(y-cy)*(y-cy);
00074         return (s / area) * ((rin2 <=  n && n <= rout2 ) ?
00075                 1.0 : 
00076                 0.0);
00077         }
00078 
00079     int cx, cy;         
00080     double rin2, rout2; 
00081     double area, s;     
00082 };
00083 
00087 struct GaussianRing2D : public std::binary_function<int, int, double>
00088 {
00097    GaussianRing2D(int centerx, int centery, double mean = 1.0, 
00098                    double stddev = 1.0, double scale = 1.0):
00099         cx(centerx), cy(centery), m(mean), sd(stddev),
00100         sdsq(stddev * stddev), s(scale), k(scale / (stddev * sqrt(TWOPI))){}
00101 
00102     double operator()(int X, int Y)
00103     {
00104         double x = static_cast<double>(X);
00105         double y = static_cast<double>(Y);
00106 
00107         double d = sqrt((x-cx)*(x-cx)+(y-cy)*(y-cy));
00108 
00109         return k * exp(-((d - m) * (d - m)) / (2.0 * sdsq));
00110     }
00111 
00112     int cx, cy;         
00113     double m;           
00114     double sd, sdsq;    
00115     double s;           
00116     double k;
00117 };

00122 struct UniformNoise : public std::binary_function<int, int, double>
00123 {
00128     UniformNoise(double minimum, double maximum):
00129         range(maximum - minimum), mod(minimum){}
00130     double operator()(int, int) { return randval(range) + mod; }
00131     double range, mod;
00132 };
00133 
00137 struct GaussianNoise : public std::binary_function<int, int, double>
00138 {
00144     GaussianNoise(double mean, double stddev): m(mean), sd(stddev){}
00145     double operator()(int, int) { return gaussrand<double>() * sd + m; }
00146     double m, sd;
00147 };
